description: A mystical safe zone - a glowing portal chamber where spirits cannot enter. Floating geometric runes provide ambient light.
visual_tags: LIGHTING: Ethereal blue and silver glow from floating runes, soft pulsing light
OBJECTS: Geometric runic symbols floating in mid-air, faint shimmer of protective barrier at edges
ATMOSPHERE: Otherworldly calm, quiet hum of spiritual energy, isolated from the outside world
COLOR PALETTE: Deep blues, silver, hints of purple, darkness at the edges

gemini.prompt:
Create a background/environment illustration in webtoon art style.

Requirements:
- Establishing shot of the location
- Bright daylight, clear visibility, natural lighting
- Clear sky
- No characters in the scene
- Detailed environment suitable for webtoon backgrounds
- Wide composition showing the space
- Atmospheric and immersive

IMPORTANT - Background Only Rules:
- Focus on ENVIRONMENTAL elements: walls, floors, ceilings, architecture, lighting, atmosphere
- DO NOT include interactive objects that characters would use (cars, furniture, seats, steering wheels, etc.)
- If the location is a vehicle interior (car, train, etc.), show ONLY the environment (windows, walls, ambient lighting) without seats or controls
- Interactive props and character positioning will be handled separately during panel composition
- This is a STATIC BACKGROUND reference that panels will composite characters onto


Location: Spirit Gateway
Type: interior
Description: A mystical safe zone - a glowing portal chamber where spirits cannot enter. Floating geometric runes provide ambient light.
Visual details: LIGHTING: Ethereal blue and silver glow from floating runes, soft pulsing light, OBJECTS: Geometric runic symbols floating in mid-air, faint shimmer of protective barrier at edges, ATMOSPHERE: Otherworldly calm, quiet hum of spiritual energy, isolated from the outside world, COLOR PALETTE: Deep blues, silver, hints of purple, darkness at the edges
